registerAZTECExtension(address,bytes,byt.details: Registers a specific public key pair to an ethereum address if a valid signature is provided or the sender is the ethereum address in question        *

params._account: - address the address to which a public key is being         registered
params._linkedPublicKey: - the public key the sender wishes to link to the _account
params._signature: - an EIP712 compatible signature of the acount & public key
